abstract: Sales of the company’s main operating system suffered because of the increasing demand for tablets, which do not run on Microsoft software.
snippet: Sales of the company’s main operating system suffered because of the increasing demand for tablets, which do not run on Microsoft software.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Sales of Microsoft’s core Windows computer operating system continued to erode for the second consecutive quarter as consumers shifted away from PCs to tablets.

headline.main: Microsoft Posts a 30% Increase in Profit, but Sales of Windows Are Weak
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Posts a 30% Increase in Profit, but Sales of Windows Are Weak
